duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform technical and mechanical work to ensure buildings, grounds, and common areas meet cleanliness, appearance, safety, and functionality standards.
Assist and complete work orders from resident requests, diagnose defects or problems, and make repairs according to policy and safety standards.
Oversee and complete the 'make-ready' process for vacant apartment homes, including pre-move-out inspection, scheduling vendors, obtaining supplies, and inspecting completed work.
Develop standards for the cleanliness and appearance of the community, amenities, building exteriors, and common areas to reflect high quality.
Inspect work performed by team members, contractors, and vendors to assess effectiveness and quality, as well as maintain inventory of maintenance materials.
Conduct safety meetings, ensure safety compliance, and demonstrate customer service skills in addressing resident and team questions and complaints.

education_certification.credential: Vocational training or Associate's degree in a related field (e.g., Maintenance, Construction, Engineering)
